info.author: Martin Golding
info.description:
Enable chaining of iterable objects queries together to give easier usage of map and filter, also provide GroupBy

result = PyLINQ.Query(people)      \
.Where( lambda p: p.Age < 20 )     \
.Select( lambda p : {              \
"NewName" : p.Name,                \
"isMale" : p.IsMale                \
})                                 \
.GroupBy( lambda k: k["isMale"])
info.keywords: Enable the chaining of iterable objects queries, Where, Select GroupBy
info.name: PyLINQ
info.summary: Enable the chaining of iterable objects queries, Where, Select GroupBy
